name: Jurrasic Run
description:
What’s up!

It’s my first ever unity game that I fully developed by myself. The first game is just like the first pancake - it’s probably not the best one, I am aware of that.

This game is a platformer Mario-like. You play as an azure dinosaur called Azoo, who travels the prehistoric world to help free oppressed dodo birds.

Collectables

  • Numeros Dinosaur Eggs
  • 1 Key per level
  • 1 Dodo bird to free from its cage per level

Goals

  • Collecting all eggs
  • Helping Dodo
  • Surviving!
Enemies NamePowersSnail Melee attack Ptero Drops egg-bombs Flying eel It follows the player and bites Slime Jumping, slowing down

KeyList

  • AWSD, arrows - movement
  • LCTRL - holding a box
  • LSHIFT - dash
  • LMOUSE - attack
  • E - use a lever
  • ESC - pause menu

Level challenges

Tutorial ❌

The “Green” Set ✅

lvl NumberThemeNew featuresFinished?1 Meadow box, moving platforms, spikes, moving saw ✅ 2 Rain firetrap, ptero, swing platform ✅ 3 Sunset arrow trap, snail ✅

The “Cave” Set ✅

lvl NumberThemeNew featuresFinished?4Yellow & Blue eels, lever mechanics, trampolines ✅
5Red & Blue falling stones, breaking platforms, target shooting, slime ✅
A note from the creator

Hi! Thanks for looking out here. This is my first gamedev project. I spend countless hours working on it. I know it probably has many bugs or stuff that doesn't work 100% as it should. Please be understanding. I hope you’ll like my game 😊
